title: When is URF coming back
body:
I know it was broken and at some times incredibly infuriating, but come on, it was good fun.
When plz riot, all i want for Christmas is URF.
{{champion:59}} + {{item:3153}} {{item:3172}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3074}} 
OP

replies.body: Maybe if URF was brought back for just like 1 day each week, instead of it being permanent or not being brought back at all...
